sentences: Ma kipisin lootusest, et ta jõuaks ajale.
Tema suurim lootus oli saada medal mängudel.
Loomulikult ei tohi kunagi raiskata lootust.
context: Hope refers to the feeling or act of wanting something to happen, especially for a good result. In Estonian sentences it is used commonly in expressions like 'järgida midagi lootusega' (to follow something with hope)
